thread.title: Watch Viola Davis Get Hit By a Bus on Jimmy Kimmel Live
thread.title_full: Watch Viola Davis Get Hit By a Bus on Jimmy Kimmel Live

author: TV Guide
title: Watch Viola Davis Get Hit By a Bus on Jimmy Kimmel Live
text: Watch Viola Davis Get Hit By a Bus on Jimmy Kimmel Live Viola Davis illustrated the dangers of texting while walking on Tuesday's ... Comment   TV Guide Posted Sep. 30, 2015 at 8:10 AM Updated at 11:31 AM Posted Sep. 30, 2015 at 8:10 AM Updated at 11:31 AM Viola Davis illustrated the dangers of texting while walking on Tuesday's Jimmy Kimmel Live! when she got hit by a bus on her way to do the interview. But, much like Regina George before her, Davis survived the "accident." "Miraculously, she's fine," Jimmy Kimmel told viewers. Davis arrived at Kimmel in one piece and went on to discuss her history-making Emmy win for Lead Actress in a Drama. Why Viola Davis' Emmy win is a victory for all actresses of color "I just thought that moment was bigger than me," the How to Get Away with Murder star said. "It was bigger than just an actress winning in that category. It was the first time an African-American woman had won in that category." By TV Guide   TV Guide Posted Sep. 30, 2015 at 8:10 AM Updated at 11:31 AM
